          Creates and returns a matrix which is idential to this one.

          Creates a matrix where all but the diagonal elements are zero.

          Creates a new idenity matrix with the specified size.

           Returns the inverse of this matrix.

a-1
 SimpleMatrix SimpleMatrix.minus(SimpleMatrix b)
           Performs a matrix subtraction operation.

c = a - b

where c is the returned matrix, a is this matrix, and b is the passed in matrix.

 SimpleMatrix SimpleMatrix.scale(double val)
          Multiplies each element in this matrix by the specified value.
 SimpleMatrix SimpleMatrix.solve(SimpleMatrix b)
           Solves for X in the following equation:

x = a-1b

where 'a' is this matrix and 'b' is an n by p matrix.
 SimpleMatrix SimpleMatrix.submatrix(int y0, int y1, int x0, int x1)
           Creates a new SimpleMatrix which is a submatrix of this matrix.
 SimpleMatrix SimpleMatrix.transpose()
           Returns the transpose of this matrix.
aT
static SimpleMatrix SimpleMatrix.wrap(DenseMatrix64F internalMat)
          Creates a new SimpleMatrix with the specified DenseMatrix64F used as its internal matrix.
